"Maybe, but we can't waste time." said Greg. The others agreed with him, although it wouldn't be wise for them to go in carelessly. The three of them stepped through, walking through the short distance.

"If it is another female realm, I wonder what kind." said Micaiah.

"Well, this one was summer resort for the most part, so I wonder if there are others and how they work." said Shonku.

"I'd like it if the Risen would just go to a normal realm." groaned Greg.

"That depends on your definition of normal. The people in these realms all seem to treat life normally." said Micaiah. Greg looked back and groaned again. Then, Shonku giggled again.

"By the way, I'm surprised you're still in the Waitress class. You like it that much?" she laughed, which made Greg blush.

"Well....I admit it is a bit flattering." he said, which made Shonku laugh more.

Anyway, soon enough, the group found the exit, going into a new realm at last.
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: Greg, Micaiah and Shonku enter

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
Finally, the group emerged through the gate, ready to see what was up now. However.....

"Hey, where's Jacob?" asked Shonku, looking back and forth but not seeing her friend anywhere.

"Now where she go?" asked Greg, sighing and looking around as well. This was hardly the time for any of them to go missing. However, as Micaiah looked around, she felt the air fogging up a bit.

"Hey, is it just me, or is it getting warmer?" she asked.

"You're right. Smells like a spa here." said Greg. The word seemed to get Shonku excited.

"A spa? I like spas. I've love to see what's around." she said.

"Shonku, we need to find Jacob." said Greg.

"Maybe she went there to rest up? Who knows." said Shonku, shrugging. Greg sighed, but her guess wasn't a bad one.

"All right, we'll go there and see if she went there." said Greg.

With that, the three of them began walking through. Before long, they ended up seeing a solitary building, which was likely the very spa they were thinking of.

"Here we are." said Shonku, as she went up and the others followed. Soon enough, they reached the front door. However, as they were about to open, the door opened for them.

"Welcome." said a voice.
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: Jacob isn't there

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
Jacob stood at the door with the faintest smile on her face. Shonku smiled and wrapped her arms around Jacob's new body. "Jacob!" Shonku yelled giddily.

Jacob just laughed and hugged back for a moment. Jacob then looked over to Greg and Micaiah, both were staring at her new clothing. Jacob was wearing a trench coat that resembled some kind of bath robe, bit looked more like the Swordmaster's coat. It was open in the front showing Jacob's assets covered in a blue bra and undergarments. She blushed and turned her body away a little bit.

"Well it looks like a new class," Greg said, with Micaiah nodding in agreement, "how'd you find it?"

"It was stuck in between realms, so I picked it up and used it and it gave me this. I was pretty weak from it, but made my way here and just relaxed. Glad you could make it." Jacob said smiling.

Micaiah then walked forward, "You aren't gonna miss your dancer uniform?"

"Don't worry," Jacob said, "Turns out since I used the Special Seal, all we need is a regular second seal of I ever want to change back."

Greg smiled and finally walked through the door, "Well I'm glad you're alright."

Jacob then smiled and walked farther into the room that had long beds and hot springs. "Why don't we just try and relax for a moment?"

Shonku grabbed Jacob and squealed with delight, shaking her back and forth. "Yeah! Come on!" She grabbed Jacob's hand and moved towards one of the many springs.

"Oof! Enjoy yourselves you two!" Jacob yelled to Micaiah and Greg.

Micaiah giggled at the two, "I guess we should rest."

Greg was still worried about Karen and everything, bit agreed to a bit of a break.

What happens next?
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: It's Jacob

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content: What's Jacob and Shonku doing?
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: Something Else happens

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
Jacob had waited outside a door of a room wearing her new Visage clothing, when Shonku came out in her green swimsuit Micaiah had gotten her. "I'm ready! This is great Jacob!"

Jacob chuckled and walked alongside Shonku to the nearest hot spring as Shonku entered. "Come on in Jacob."

Jacob's face flushed as she dropped the trench coat and was only left in her blue bikini. She blushed, smiling and walked in. The spring was extremely hot, but helped with her somewhat sore muscles. She sat and slid down until the water rose above her shoulders. Shonku giggled happily and slid next to Jacob. "Thanks Jacob. It's been FOREVER since I've relaxed like this."

Jacob smiled, "Of course, you deserve it." Shonku and Jacob laid inside it until Shonku asked.

"Hey. How're you able to go through this so easily?"

Jacob looked over to Shonku and took one of her hands, "Honestly, it's cause of you."

Shonku was somewhat taken back from this, "Wha?"

"You're always so easy going with me about all this. I felt more comfortable around you, whether it was back in our realm or when I danced in the tavern. You made it easier. I'm glad you're here." Jacob explained.

Shonku blushed and she smiled, "Thanks," she said somewhat shy before she moved closer to Jacob and leaned against her. Jacob didn't mind and smiled as they enjoyed themselves.

What happens next?
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: Jacob and Shonku

choices: Moving on to the next realm
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
Some time later, Jacob and Shonku exited the main spa area and went to a bedroom provided for the group. Soon after they got in, Greg and Micaiah joined them.

"How was your time together?" asked Shonku.

"It was nice, quite relaxing, although I think I've had enough relaxing to last a while." sighed Greg.

"You want to leave?" asked Micaiah, a curious look on her face.

"Well yes, I'd like to find a realm where I'm back to normal and can look for Karen. Once that's done, then I can relax. And this waitress uniform is getting a little tiresome." Greg said.

"I hear you. Perhaps there will be more luck in the next realm." said Jacob. Greg nodded at him.

However, most of the day was already gone by now, so they spent the night at the spa, occasionally watching other people come in and out of the resort. Soon enough, Greg got tired and went to sleep, and the others soon followed.

*****Next Day*****

The next day came, and everyone was soon all dressed up.

"So, any idea where the next gate is?" asked Greg.

"Not too far actually. I asked around, and it's just a little walk." said Jacob.

"Well, that's a relief." smiled Shonku, and Micaiah laughed with her. The group was soon on its way out. However, Greg did make a remark that perhaps they could return once things had settled down a bit. The others agreed.
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: Later on

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
The four moved the the realm at once as both Greg and Jacob blacked out. When the two came to, they saw they were male again.

"Finally!" Greg said relieved, finally having his old body and class back. Jacob was male, now returned to his original uniform. Jacob stood and stretched relieved, but then realized where they were.

"Um guys? This doesn't look good..." They were looking down a long, tall hallway of prison cells. It was dark, dank, and foggy with no one in sight. Jacob turned back and looked at them. "Me and Shonku can look for an exit while-" Before he could finish there was a slight noise and that sounded quiet but high pitch. "You should check that out."

Greg nodded and looked through each cell with Micaiah. Jacob and Shonku looked at some of the doors to see if anyone was there. Greg then approached a cell and saw...
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: Moving on to the next realm

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
Greg gasped at the sight, seeing who was in the cell. It was none other than Karen, sitting in a corner, still wearing her War Cleric garb.

"Karen!" Greg almost yelled, getting the brown-haired girl's attention. Karen had two pigtails at the side, covering parts of her face. Her clothes still seemed to be in good shape, despite what looked like terrible condition. Karen turned around and gasped.

"Greg! What are you doing here?!" she said, coming up to the bars.

"What do you think? Looking for you. Did you think I wouldn't after you vanished?" inquired Greg.

"Well, no. But I didn't expect anyone else to let you go, given the circumstances." she said.

"Well, I'm here and that's that. Stay back." said Greg, pulling out his sword. He briefly smiled, loving the feeling of a sword in his hands again. With a good swipe, he was able to get a good strike on the lock, knocking it loose.

"Wow, shoddy workmanship." said Jacob. Greg ran in and helped Karin out, as she stumbled a bit walking out.

"Who are you?" she asked.

"It's a long story. We'll save the explanations for when we get out." said Greg.

"Yes. I don't think it will be long before whomever is in charge discovers us." said Micaiah.
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: ...Karen.

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
They ran back to the gate as they heard yells and heavy footsteps in the next room. Jacob quickly tossed a fire spell at the door opening leaving fire blocking the path. "We need to find a safe realm. Follow me!" Jacob yelled to them as he ran in with Greg, Karen, Micaiah, and Shonku following. They ran through, Jacob hoping that they wouldn't find them where they were going.

Jacob stumbled out of the Outrealm gate with the others as they were in front of a familiar ruins, it being the first realm they found that led to them being a female. Jacob stood up and brushed himself off as he helped the others get up. He looked over to see Karen wrapping her arms around her brother in a what looked like a tight and somewhat painful hug. "Thank you so much!" She squealed out of exasperation and relief. Greg simply hugged her back, overjoyed with finding her.

Jacob walked over to Karen and smiled slightly as she turned to him. "Um...Greg who's this?" Karen asked, a little scared, but still curious.

"My name's Jacob. Your brother here saved my life and thought I should help him out with finding you. Your brother's a good man y'know that?" Jacob said, trying not to scare her as best as he could. She nodded and then hugged Greg again.

"Thanks, Jacob," then she turned and saw Micaiah and Shonku. The two walked over and introduced themselves, Karen giving similar replies.

"I think it best we rested here," Jacob said.

"That sounds nice," Shonku said.

What happens next?
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: Getting out

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
****Karen's bio*****
Age: 16
Appearance: 5'2 feet tall, and 125 lbs. Long brown hair tied up in two pigtails that fall to her shoulders (similar to Serra). Average build for a girl. Traditional War Cleric look with pink and yellow colors. Doesn't wear a headpiece.
Personality: Shy, but friendly and helpful.
Race: Human
Class: War Cleric (Level 5)
Uses: Axes (Level B), Staves (Level B)
Equipment: Bolt Axe, Mend Staff, Fortify Staff, and a Concoction.
Skills: Renewal, Dual Support+, Miracle, Demosielle, Focus

*****End bio*****

"So, I was just minding my business one day when those dark Risen ambushed me. Don't remember much between that and when I was in the cell." said Karen.

"Wow, rough time." said Jacob.

"Were there others?" asked Micaiah.

"I saw some others in cells as the days went on. Most of them were Clerics and such, but some were Sages." said Karen.

"What could a bunch of Risen want with Clerics?" asked Micaiah.

"Can't be anything good. My question is what would they accomplish. From what I've read, Risen are usually as wild as beasts, not exactly known for mercy or strategy, so why kidnapp young maidens?" wondered Greg.

"I heard that long ago, back in the old days of Archanea, the Shadow Dragon Medeus once used four young maidens to revive himself, and even use them as human shields, so it's not out of the question." said Shonku.

"Well, we won't get much info sitting around. Let's sleep here and rest up for tomorrow." said Greg. The others nodded, while Karen giggled.

"What's so funny?" asked Greg.

"Never pegged you as a leader big brother." Karen giggled.

"You kidding me! I was always in charge!" defended Greg.

"Ah huh, sure." said Karen. Greg smiled, nearly tackling his sister and tickling her. Micaiah gave the two a tender smile, happy to see Greg finally reunited with his family.

The group settled down there in the ruins, with Karen snugging tightly with Greg. Greg just found her, and god forbid he let anything separate her from him again.
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: Later on

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
Jacob woke up next to Shonku with her in his arms. He smiled as he laid her down gently, still asleep. He walked through the ruins to see Micaiah just woke up as she yawned and stretched, then noticed Jacob and waved as he did back. He walked by Greg and Karen to see Greg with his arms wrapped around her and Karen resting her head on his chest. Jacob smiled at the heartwarming scene, but they would need to keep moving in order to lose the Risen. He walked over and shook Greg slightly, causing him to wake up but not Karen. "Huh?"

"We should find somewhere else. We probably have to jump one or two more realms before we really lose them." Jacob said. Greg nodded as Jacob walked off back to wake Shonku.

Greg shook Karen lightly, "Hey Karen?"

Karen groaned for a moment before replying, "...five more minutes..."

Greg chuckled and tickled her chin as she finally woke up. She got up and stayed next to Greg for most of the time. Greg made his way back over to Jacob with Karen.

"Any idea for the next realm?" Greg inquired.

Jacob thought about it for a moment, saying, "I was actually thinking about heading through..."

What does he decide?
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: New Day

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
"Well we've already been through the red one. Let's choose a different path and jump through the blue one this time." Jacob said.

Greg nodded in approval as the five of them gathered outside it and walked through at once. About halfway through though, Jacob and Greg felt funny. "Oogh.."

"Greg?" A worried Karen asked. "Are you okay?"

"Uh-oh," Micaiah chimed in, "You think you and Jacob are...you know?"

"It...It's not that...something else..." Jacob breathed out.

"N-Now that you mention it...I feel funny too," Shonku added.

"M-me too...Greg what's happening?" Karen said a little scared.

"I-.....I.." That was all Greg got out before the lot of them collapsed and laid there as they were pushed through the next gate.

------------

Jacob opened his eyes to see trees above him, and almost instantly knew something was up. His body felt...different unexplainably. He looked at his chest to make sure he wasn't a female. After looking past the new grown fur, he saw he was still a ma- "F-fur?!" Jacob yelled as he fell back again. He looked at himself to see he was wearing grey plated armor that didn't cover much of him. He then looked to see the Outrealm Gate and another Taguel in red armor with a small patch of red fur on his head, who he assumed to be Greg.

Greg awoke dazed and immediately saw Jacob staring at him. Both of them now had large amounts of hair/fur on their heads and bodies. "This is new..." Greg added as he looked at himself. He turned and saw the three that were with them were now Manaketes. Karen had a yellow cloak, Micaiah a red dress similar to Tiki's, and Shonku a white dress. The three woke up and long story short freaked.

As they panicked, Jacob reached into a pouch and pulled out a small stone, "What's thi-" Before he could finish, a large dome of stone caved above him.

"Jacob!" Yelled Greg as the stone shook and broke and in it's place stood a Taguel now known as Jacob.

"Whoa..." He said as he looked at his rabbit-like form. Everyone was in awe, while Shonku...

"Oh my gosh Jacob! You're so cute!" Shonku ran over and jumped on Jacob's head. Jacob grunted as Shonku petted his fur. And a minute later she had Jacob laying down with her petting him.

Greg smiled while Karen and Micaiah laughed. "Why don't you try, Greg?"

Greg transformed a moment later as Karen jumped on his back playfully and Micaiah simply petted his head.

"Wait," Shonku said, "We have Dragonstones."

The three transformed into powerful dragons a few moments later. Karen was a green dragon, Micaiah a pink one, and Shonku a blue one.

They all looked at each other. "So what do you think? Stay or leave?"

What do they decide?
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: The blue Outrealm gate

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
"Well now what?" asked Micaiah.

"This could be fun! I want to ride on Greg!" cheered Karen.

"Yeah right. You're bigger and stronger than me in that dragon form. You should let me ride on you." smirked Greg.

"Hey, no fair!" pouted Karen. The rest of the group took a bit of a laugh at that.

"So, do you know what this place is called?" asked Shonku.

"I believe it might be Tania. I heard it's a place completely ruled by shapeshifters. Somehow I guess that has some influence on whoever enters the realm, like what happened when we ended up at the beach and the spa." said Jacob.

"Wait, you guys went to the beach and a spa?" asked Karen.

"Yeah, and your big brother became a girl." giggled Shonku.

"Shonku! Really?!" Greg almost yelled, as Karen nearly burst into laughter.

"Oh, that's previous! Were you cute big brother?" she asked.

"Oh, he was great. He was the best waitress in the town when we got there." said Micaiah with a smile. She was only trying to help, but it wasn't. Karen only laughed more. Greg groaned at this.

"Well, I guess it's okay to get it out of the way now." he said finally. He then went on to tell Karen about the spa trip as well, and how Jacob ended up as a Dancer and then as a Visage. Karen laughed at them all, and was surprised to hear of even new classes out there.

"Wow, I wonder if there are others out there." said Karen.

"Who knows. Anyway, we need to get out of here pronto." said Jacob.

"Let's travel for a bit. You don't get to be a dragon often." said Shonku.

"Only you guys get that." groaned Jacob along with Greg.
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: Stay for a bit

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
They were beginning to get used to their forms when they decided it would be wise to leave to a new realm. They ran/flew to the next Outrealm gate and walked through the next gate as they headed toward the new realm. They all walked through again when they all felt that familiar changing feeling and collapsed.

------

Jacob awoke in a large room with clothes, weapons, vulneries, staffs, everything lined up. Jacob stood an suddenly saw "herself" in a nearby mirror, looking just like the merchant Anna in a Trickster outfit. "Uh oh. Greg, I think I just became-" was all he got out before he saw four more identical Anna's on the ground in front of him. "Uh oh..."

The next few minutes were confusing as they tried to discover who was who. Finally everything was straightened out. "There's gotta be a better way to identify us," Anna said.

"What if we took a few of those clothes and dressed differently?" Anna suggested.

Anna turned and nodded, "If that's what we have to do, we'll do it."

First, Anna (Greg) decided to keep her Trickster outfit. Anna (Karen) found a merchant robe and backpack and put them on. Anna (Micaiah found a Trickster outfit with the colors reversed. Anna (Shonku) found a Yukata and wore it happily. Finally, Anna (Jacob) was left with a merchant robe meant for summertime, which it currently was that was open in the front showing her assets off.

Jacob blushed, while Shonku giggled.

Greg and the other Anna's left the room to see they had their own shop in this realm. "This could be interesting," Micaiah added.

Do they stay or leave?
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: Running back to the gate

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
"What the heck?" Jacob groaned at what she saw.

Not only did they see their own shop here, but they weren't the only Anna's around. In fact, they were everywhere! Annas in all forms of dress were everyone, and Greg could swear that she saw even saw some kids like her running around.

"Someone please me I'm hallucinating." sighed Jacob.

"I don't think so." said Shonku, a little off-balance herself. Karen looked around in awe, partially because she now looked like an adult, and at how people there were exactly like her now.

"I always imagined being the same age as you Greg, but this wasn't what I had in mind." said Karen.

"Me neither." said Greg.

Suddenly, one Anna came up to them, wearing a traditional Trickster outfit. She looked straight at Jacob and saw her uniform before smiling.

"Oh, you're from the Rescue Mines aren't you? How are things going there? I was planning on checking it out myself" she asked.

"Huh?" asked Jacob. However, Shonku intervened before she could say anything.

"Yeah, she is. Things are going swimmingly. We just decided to get together here for a bit." she said. The other Anna just smiled and nodded before leaving, saying a quick "Ta ta" before going.

"That was close. I'm not sure it would be a good idea to tell them that we're not really Annas." said Micaiah.

"Who would believe us anyway?" said Karen.

"Good point. Well, since we're here, we might as well explore. Perhaps the new look will keep the Risen away from us for now." said Greg.

"True. Besides, from what I've gathered, the Annas have always had great stuff. Perhaps there's something we can use to buff you two up." she said, pointing to Greg and Karen. "You're pretty low leveled now that I remember."

"True enough." sighed Greg and Karen together.
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: Explore Anna's realm

choices: Stay at an inn for the night
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
The five of them wandered the town looking at shop and shop when Jacob finally found some kind of special seal from an Anna wearing her same suit with Karen while the other three looked at a nearby shop. After what felt like an eternity of haggling, Jacob finally bought some stuff.

She then proceeded to buy and forge a Killer Axe, and Silver Axe for Karen along with buying a Rescue staff. Jacob walked back over with Karen to where Greg and the others had restocked vulneries and whatnot.

"Find anything for a bargain, Anna," Jacob called Greg, trying to act like the many of Anna's around her.

"Just some vulneries and some Silver weapons," Greg replied as she saw the seal she bought. "What's that?"

"I saw another special seal and thought I should buy it. Kinda expensive though..." Jacob complained, right away realizing he had a finger placed in his chin like Anna from their realm did.

"Do we need anything else here," Micaiah asked the four.

"Well if we're ever being chased down, coming here could confuse the Risen. Plus we'd have some sisters for backup," Greg said.

"Of course," an Anna yelled from her nearby store window, wearing a blacksmith's smock, "Us sisters look out for one another!"

They all couldn't help but smile and laugh a little bit. What do they decide to do?
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: Walking around

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
"Well, now what?" asked Greg.

"Well, since we've found Karen and all, we're not in a rush." said Shonku, putting a finger on her chin like a typical Anna.

"That's true. Besides, I guess this realm ain't so bad when you think about it." said Greg.

"Yeah, it's not as bad as the summer realm we were in. I've heard rumors of the RealmAnna but never really believed it." said Jacob.

"I wonder how many people even know of this many Annas." said Micaiah.

"Probably not, even to those in the Outrealms." said Greg.

"Anyway, how about we stay an inn for the night if we're planning on staying around a bit?" said Karen.

"Sounds good." said Greg. After that, the group found a local inn, where they were able to get a couple rooms for the group, although they would have to split up a bit. It wasn't that much of a problem though. Until night came, they toured around a bit, with Karen really getting engrossed in the whole thing, much to Greg's amusement at times.

Some time later, they retired for some dinner at the inn and then went to bed, happy to sleep at least somewhat peacefully for now.
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: Stay at an inn for the night

choices: ...they decide to run one of the shops today.
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
Jacob woke up looking at the ceiling. She could tell that just from the glow of the window that it was still pretty early outside. Nevertheless, she stood and stretched her arms. She saw Shonku and Micaiah still asleep in the two other beds. Jacob moved quietly, not wanting to wake them, but also not wanting them to see that she went to sleep just in her bra and undergarments. Jacob placed the summer merchant robes on and walked back into the room. She shook Shonku and Micaiah gently. The two woke up and began getting around for the next day.

Jacob went across the hall to the other room where Karen and Greg slept. He did the same with them as they were ready after a few minutes. Jacob waited in the lobby-like area as the four other Anna's came down. "Alright, I'm interested in seeing what this place will really look like." Jacob said, actually excited to see what they could do.

The four walked outside and moved past the shops they first passed when...
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: A new day in RealmAnna

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
"Oh hey, it's the shop from yesterday." said Karen as they passed by the very one.

"Yeah, I guess so. Why don't we take up shop today?" suggested Jacob. Greg gave her a wierd look.

"Really? I would have figured that you would have wanted to leave sooner, given our appearance." said Greg, putting a finger on his chin.

"True, but this isn't exactly half bad. It's not really embarassing. And we might get a lot of cool stuff." smiled Jacob.

"That's true. I agree." said Greg. "So how about we take up shop today?"

"Cool!" said Karen, her little enthusiasm looking a little wierd in Anna's body. With that, the five of them walked into the shop. Meanwhile, Karen pulled Greg over.

"Greg, is Micaiah an Einherjar? I noticed the blue glow around her before we came here." she said.

"Yeah, we found her just before our journey got too far along. She's been a great help." said Greg.

"Well, that blue glow is gone. So maybe she's real here." said Karen.

"Perhaps. Why do you ask?" asked Greg.

"Because I can tell you like her." smiled Karen, which looked a bit devious on Anna's face. Greg blushed a bit.

"Perhaps I do. At least a bit, but keep that between us." said Greg.

"My lips are sealed." smiled Karen.
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: ...they decide to run one of the shops today.

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
A few moments later, the five Anna's set up shop. Jacob was at the counter with Greg swapping places everyone once and awhile. Karen hung out and dealed with vulneries and staffs, Micaiah with magical items such as tomes, and Shonku with weapons and clothing. The five decided to work for awhile. At one moment, Greg stood next to Jacob.

"Hey Jacob, you okay?" Greg said in Anna's worried voice.

"Yeah. Why?" Jacob said, curious of the origin of Greg's question.

"Well, I didn't think you'd want to stay," Greg added, "What gives?"

"Well, I thought that we should try to blend in for a day at least. Also I thought we could make some money or get some good items." Jacob added.

Greg thought it over and placed a finger on her chin, "Well I guess that makes sense."

Jacob soon got tired along with the others, sweatting and such, leaving an hour left until they'd decide to leave the realm or just rest here again.

What happens next?
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: Taking up shop

choices: The other side of the mountain
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
"Phew, rough times." said Karen as she laid down on a chair. The others were a bit tired after trying to run the place. Although Micaiah still seemed to be going strong.

"You still seem to be full of energy." remarked Jacob.

"I feel a lot better in this world for some reason. Feels nice." smiled Micaiah. Greg gave a small smile at seeing her do well. At that point, someone entered.

"Hello there." said Anna, wearing the typical Trickster outfit.

"Hello, what can we do?" offered Micaiah.

"I've got a proposition for you. I need someone to come with me over the mountain there to get something important. You all want to come as my "sisters"? she smiled.

"What do you think?" asked Shonku to the others.

"Well I'm in." said Greg, who wanted to explore more.

"I might as well go too, to keep you out of trouble anyway." said Jacob. Karen and Shonku soon joined in.

"Great, it's a deal. Shall we get going?" smiled Anna.

With that, the group was on its way onward, saying hi to many passing Annas. Greg got a bit disoriented as they kept doing it. It would probably take some time for her to really get used to it if they stayed there long-term.

They left the town behind, walking up and winding around the nearby mountain that was right outside town.

"Where are we going?" asked Karen to Greg.

"We'll find out soon." said Greg.
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: Anna (Trickster) comes by

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
Jacob and the others finally rounded up around the top of the mountain as they looked over the land they had to reach still. Jacob knew this wasn't going to be a long trip. Jacob made his way to Greg who was up front with the rest of them. "G-Greg? I-I'm f-f-freebing!" Jacob chattered out.

Greg laughed to herself, "You're still wearing you're summer outfit?" Greg said.

"I bibn't thibk it woulb be so c-colb!" Jacob got out through her freezing lips.

Anna leaned out from the Merchant cart they were carrying stuff in and said, "Well come on in then! Can't risk losing a sister in this monopo- business!"

Jacob entered with Anna and sat as she pulled her knees to her chest trying to keep warm. "Thanks."

"Don't mention it...but you might need to rent that spot," Anna said with her signature pose and devious smile.

Jacob groaned but paid up anyway, "Where are we going anyway?"

"There's a different merchant town near the ocean on the other side here. Once we get there, we'll make so much gold!" Anna said giddily.

"Uhm...that's great. Can you let go please?" Jacob said to Anna as she crushed her in her arms.

"Oops," said Anna as she let go and smiled. "You know this isn't my first trip like this."

"Really?"

"Yeah. I met a man named Chrom who led a force called the Sheperds across the continent in world crisises." Anna told Jacob.

"He sounds pretty interesting," Jacob commented.

What happens next?
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: The other side of the mountain

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
Greg and the group with her slowly reached the finishing town near the base of the mountain.

"Sheesh, does it have to be so far away?" groaned Greg, almost feeling like collapsing. Her body wasn't quite as durable as it was before.

"Unfortunately yes, it's where the best fishing is in the whole realm." explained Anna. "Look at the bright side though, maybe we can charge a fee for it." she smiled.

"Um, sure." said Greg. Then, she turned to Micaiah. "Wow, she doesn't think of much else."

"Well, she seems pretty lively." smiled Micaiah.

"If you can call it that." said Greg.

"Well I think it's nice. This world seems so lively. I feel like a part of it already." smiled Micaiah.

"Not sure about that." said Greg.

Anyway, along with their caravan, they made it towards the fishing merchant town. There, Greg and the others saw quite a few Annas wearing different clothing than what they saw before. All of them had the trademark and look and ponytail, but some were wearing fishing gear. Greg also turned to her side and saw one working as a blacksmith, who was essentially wearing little more than a black bikini, which was probably best given how hot it was in there.

"Wow, more Annas. Yet the atmosphere feels different." said Shonku.

"Maybe. Anyway let's follow her." said Jacob.

"Over here sisters!" called Anna from a few yards away.

"Might as well get this over with." said Greg.

While they were there, they made numerous exchanges with other Annas, with money going every which way. So much that Greg pretty much lost track and just started going along with it before long. Micaiah on the other hand enjoyed the experience, although she wasn't too sure herself. Greg was happy though to see her being so lively.
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: Reach the fishing town

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
They day died down as the five traveling Anna's were completely whipped out from traveling and selling. The original Anna was still as perky as usual though. Jacob looked over to her saying, "How can you do what you do so often?"

"It takes only one thing to get me going sis," Anna said as the coin clinked in her hand.

"Guess it doesn't take a lot to get you going," mumbled Greg.

"Only because I don't need a lot sweetie," Anna said perky. She then loaded everything back up after giving them their share of gold. "I'm sure you wouldn't want to make the trip back. So I'll see you some other time!"

They waved to her as she rode back towards the mountains. Jacob then turned back to the others, "Alright. We have two choices the way I see it. We can stay longer in this realm or head to another one?" Jacob the turned to Karen who had been enjoying this realm and gave her the first choice.

What did Karen decide to do?
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: Anna gets done

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
"Well, you guys said you went to a beach realm once? I want to see that." said Karen.

"I suppose it's okay, although I'm hesitant in allowing what happened last time to happen again." said Greg.

"Maybe it'll be different this time." said Shonku.

"We'll see. So how do we even get there? We've just gone through realms with no real destination." said Greg.

"Perhaps we should find a gate first and go from there." said Jacob. The group agreed and they were soon on their way out of the town after saying good bye to the other Annas there. As they walked out, Micaiah looked a little sad.

"What's wrong?" asked Greg.

"Well, I just felt so lively here, like I was a new person. Feels like a shame to leave." said Micaiah.

"That's true. We should come back then." said Greg.

"That would be great." smiled Micaiah, which made Greg smile too.

Anyway, they got a little ways past the town, and soon another Outrealm Gate was in sight.

"You know, it's kind of surprising that it's so easy to find a gate nowadays." said Greg.

"Yeah, I guess so. Anyway, let's go in. Perhaps we'll find our way back to the beach." said Jacob. With that, the group entered the realm, walking the short distance inside. Most of them were thinking about the beach, and surely enough an "exit" seemed to appear. They walked into the light, soon feeling the familiar heat of the sun. Greg looked down at himself, seeing that his normal Hero look was back, and the others had the same too.

"Phew, no female change this time." he sighed.
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: Back to the beach

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
Jacob walked forward and looked around, "Wait. This place seems real familiar." He said, "Follow me."

The group followed Jacob as they found themselves on the same beach they first set camp on. "Whaddya say? Camp here again?"

With no objections, the group began setting camp up as Jacob left out to the woods nearby and started chopping some of the wood. As he did that, he heard someone. "Jacob?"

Jacob turned startled to see Shonku standing there with her hands behind her back. "Oh, Shonku. What're you doing out here?"

"Well...I've been meaning to tell you something." Jacob listened intently, "Maybe you noticed, but I'm getting less and less shy."

"I did notice that you seem more comfortable around others. Where are you going with this Shonku?" Jacob asked.

"Well...it's because of you. I feel stronger around you, I feel unstoppable around you, and...I...I love you."

This caught Jacob off guard. They were always friends and now she was offering up that they were more. "I know, Jacob. If you don't feel the same, I completely understa-"

Jacob planted a kiss on her lips, stopping her mid-sentence. Jacob held her head with one hand and back with the other as she kissed him back. It lasted a few moments before he pulled away smiling. "Guess you're not the only person who gets strength from others." Jacob said.

Shonku blushed as Jacob wrapped his arms around her for awhile until they finally returned to the camp.

What happens next?
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: The Beach Part 2

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
"What are you doing?" smiled Greg as he watched Karen splash around. Karen hadn't changed into a swimsuit or anything, but she had taken her boots off and was splashing around in the shallow water.

"Come on, it's fun." she giggled at Greg. Doing the same, Greg ran over to where she was, and when he did, she splashed a bit in his direction.

"Oh, you're going to pay for that." said Greg. The two of them went back and forth splashing each other for a bit, until Greg recommended that they stop while they still had sunlight to dry their clothes.

"Ah, feels so much better than that cell." said Karen.

"I sure hope so." said Greg as he laid down next to her.

"You know, I'm kind of liking this realm hopping thing. Maybe even after the Risen are done, perhaps we could keep doing it." said Karen.

"Don't know if we can keep the group together that long." said Greg.

"It could be just you and me, and Micaiah too." said Karen, scooting over towards Greg, who laughed a bit.

"I guess it could work. We'll see whenever that happens." said Greg.

After that, the two caught up on some old things while drying their clothes. Soon enough, the sun went down and the group prepared some dinner. Both Jacob and Shonku came out of the woods blushing and Greg got a good guess on what went on. Karen didn't understand at all though.

Soon enough, dinner was done and they were off to bed. Karen snuggled with Greg again, with Micaiah near them and Jacob and Shonku together as well.
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: Later On

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content: Jacob woke up again later that night and looked out at the Ocean again. He turned to see Greg and Micaiah were sleeping quite close to each other with Karen laying on Greg's chest with his arms wrapped around her. Jacob chuckled and saw Shonku still sleeping in her sparkling Bride outfit. Jacob stood out there for a while more when...
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: During the night

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
"Ugh!" Jacob began getting this weird feeling inside him. Before he knew it, his vision faded, causing him to pass out.

*****The Morning*****

Greg woke up with Karen in his arms, smiling as he did and patted her on the head while encouraging her to wake up. She slowly did, although it took a few tries to do so. Soon enough, they got the others up, although Karen was soon giggling to herself.

"What's up?" asked Greg before he looked down and sighed. They saw Jacob laying there, apparently a Visage again. Greg wasn't entirely enthusiastic about it, although Shonku and Micaiah giggled a bit. Sighing again, Greg bent down and shook Jacob a bit, getting "her" to wake up. Long story short, they got Jacob up, and Greg covered her mouth when she almost screamed.

"Thanks." said Jacob.

"No problem, but why did you change again?" asked Greg.

"How should I know?" asked Jacob.

"And Greg is still the same. I wonder why." said Shonku.

"Should we go then?" asked Greg.

"Well, what do you think Karen?" asked Shonku.
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: ...Jacob starts feeling weird

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
"Awwww! I don't wanna leave yet," Karen said. She walked over and bent next to Jacob. "You'll be okay like this for another day, right?"

Jacob wasn't enjoying her current clothes or form, but Karen really wanted to stay. Jacob let out a sigh, "Alright Karen. One more day then we have to start moving again."

Karen hugged Jacob, catching her off guard, "Thanks Jacob!"

Jacob smiled lightly and hugged back. Shonku walked over and helped her up, still somewhat giggling. "Alright Karen. You wanted to stay, so any idea what you wanted to do?"

"Well that town could be interesting. I wanna check it out," Karen said. With that they went back off to the town.

What happens next?
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: Stay around longer

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
The five walked through the town, Karen looking at some vendors, including another Anna until she noticed a building fairly large. "Ooh! I wanna head there, that looks like a fun place!"

Jacob and Greg both groaned at the sight. They remembered it as the bar where Jacob was pulled into dancing and Greg ended up being a waitress. But they played along and went in. The place was still fairly busy as people still waited around. Karen was getting hungry as was the rest of them, so they ordered food. When the waiter came, he stopped and looked at Jacob. "Wait, I know you."

Jacob knew it was probably cause of when she danced. The man placed the food down quickly and pulled Jacob out of her chair without warning until she disappeared behind a door. Karen leaned forward, "What was that about?"

"Remember when I told you Greg was a waitress at one moment and Jacob was a dancer?" Karen nodded. "We'll this is where they were. And my guess is that they want an encore!"

Shonku and Karen shared a laugh as Greg smiled. He couldn't help it, he got out of being a waitress as Jacob had to dance again. A few minutes passed when Jacob appeared on the stage yet again. Karen laughed when she saw Jacob's garbs. Jacob was just as shy as before, bit she just let the uniform do the work as she danced again. They stayed there a good amount of time until it was sunset. Finally Jacob made her way to the table and collapsed in a chair.

"How was it," Micaiah asked, just out of curiosity.

Jacob just groaned as they finished eating and collected the gold from Jacob's performance. They reached the campsite as Jacob collapsed in the sand. Karen giggled and knelt next to her and tried to massage her shoulders, "Thanks Jacob. I had fun today. Especially when you danced!" She giggled.

Jacob let out a slight groan and looked up at Karen and smiled, "Thanks Karen...feeling better already..."

What happens next?
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: The town

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
"Well, I'd say today was eventful. What say we turn in?" said Shonku, seeing the setting sun.

"Hmm, might as well. Got things to do and places to see I guess." said Greg.

With that,t he group got themselves a good dinner before settling themselves in for the night. As usual, Karen snuggled up on Greg.

"Don't you ever get tired of sleeping on me?" asked Greg.

"No. I want to make sure you're still with me every morning." said Karen as she buried her head into Greg's chest. He gently patted her on the head before going to sleep himself. Soon enough, they were all asleep.

*****The Next Day*****

Eventually, the next morning came. Greg woke up to Karen's weight on his chest, which he had to admit he was getting used to.

"Karen, wake up time." said Greg as he shook her gently. Karen's eyes fluttered open eventually.

After that, Greg watched everyone else wake up and get themselves an early meal.
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: They go to bed

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
They each huddled around eating when Jacob dragged herself over, sore from her dances. She sat and began eating along with them. After a while, Micaiah spoke up. "What's our plan now?"

Jacob spoke up, "I wanna head into another realm...I've had enough of these gender changes..." She groaned. Shonku nodded in agreement with her dancing friend.

Greg looked over to Karen, "What do you think sis? Ready to go or is Jacob gonna have to dance again?" Jacob groaned for obvious reasons.

"Well as much as I'd like to see that," Karen said grinning, "I agree that we should keep moving."

"Thank you..." Jacob groaned as Karen laughed and patted her friend on the back.

"There's no way you'll dance for us is there?"

"There's not enough gold in all the realms to make me." Jacob said following it with a slight chuckle.

The group packed up their belongings and stood in front of the gate yet again.

"Where do you think this one goes," Shonku asked.

"I don't know," Jacob said, "Just make me male again..."

The five then entered.

What happens next?
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: Deciding what to do

choices: The others wake up as well
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
"Sometimes I get tired of all this walking." said Shonku as they walked through the gate into the space between.

"Get over it. It's not that bad." said Greg. As he said that, a glow appeared in front of them, meaning that yet another realm was in reach. The light engulfed the whole group, and Greg nearly found himself passing out. Greg felt like it was sometime before he was able to wake up again.

He ended up waking up to a bright and clear sky with a fierce wind whipping around him. And a wyvern on top of that.

"Woah!" said Greg as he stumbled to his feet. However, he looked down to see that, instead of his Hero outfit, he was wearing a Wyvern Lord's outfit, only it was dark blue like normal. Stumbling around a bit, he saw his friends over to the side. Shonku was wearing a light blue Pegasus Knight outfit. Karen was wearing a dark pink Falcon Knight outfit, with Micaiah having a reddish Dark Flier outfit. Looking to Jacob, he had grey-like Wyvern Lord armor, and he could see all the respective mounds wandering around.

Another quick look around showed that they were on top of a mountain. One that was so high that it was above the clouds. It was a bit nauseating to think about.

"Oh gods." sighed Greg as he stumbled back a bit. Heights were never a fun part for both him and his sister.

"Um, Karen, you might want to get up. NOW!" Greg almost yelled. The shock woke Karen wide awake, and she ended up almost hitting her brother.

"What the? Where are we?" asked Karen, not liking how the scenery was.

"Let's just say I have no idea where the ground is." said Greg with a deadpan look.
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: In the Sky

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
Jacob opened his eyes groggily and groaned, just wanting to lay there for awhile.

That was until he heard the bloodcurdling scream of a Wyvern.

He sat straight up and saw Karen with a impression of fear and horror across her face, Greg's not being very different. Jacob looked over the side of the cliff he was sleeping on to see nothing but clouds below him. He pulled away from the cliff side, dragging Shonku and Micaiah away as well. He then began waking the two up as he yelled to Greg. "What is going on in this realm?"

"Beats me," Greg replied in a monotone reply, "But I don't like these heights."

"When I asked to be anything but female awhile ago, this didn't come to mind." A moment later the two girls awoke with similar reactions. Soon the five of them stood watching the creatures fly around the sky.

"Greg," asked Karen in a small voice, "What are we gonna do?"

At that moment, the creatures turned from their circling paths and made a dash toward them.

"Get down!" Greg yelled as they either found a large rock or boulder to hide behind from the impact. Greg held Karen close to his chest as the air filled with dust. They each looked over the rock when the dust settled to see each creature standing there, so...peacefully.

Jacob walked towards a Wyvern as it placed it's head against his chest. Jacob wasn't sure what to do at first when this happened, but he ended up petting the creature as it let out a small screech.

Shonku and Micaiah did the same with their Pegasus' as they neighed in delight of their "fliers".

Greg and Karen soon walked around their cover and looked at each of their beasts. Karen approached the Falcon slowly as she placed her hand gently on it's head. The horse let out a low noise in content as Karen began petting it. Greg had a meeting similar to Jacob's, although his seemed more aggressive than Jacob's as it quickly dug it's head into Greg's chest.

They all looked at the scene awestruck when Karen jumped on top of her Falcon. "What are you doing?!" Greg yelled in concern.

"I think we should ride them and at least get off the mountain." Karen replied back.

"Well you aren't going without me," Greg countered as he climbed on his Wyvern.

Jacob shot a glance to Shonku and Micaiah who were looking at him. Jacob sighed then shrugged as they mounted as well.

What happens next?
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: The others wake up as well

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
"Woah, oh no!" stumbled Greg as his wyvern took off. Similar reactions came from the whole group, with Karen holding on for dear life. Micaiah was perhaps the only one really handling this well at all, although fear was on her face too.

"C-Could you slow down a bit?" Greg asked the black wyvern. The wyvern seemed to react, slowing down a bit, which allowed Greg to get up a bit.

"Okay, I guess that's better. We really should find a place to land." said Greg.

"I agree. Where to go?" asked Karen.

"I see something on that other mountain." said Shonku. She pointed forward to what seemed to be some kind of small town.

"Guess that will work well enough for now." said Greg, trying to point the wyvern in the right direction while also still holding on for dear life. Karen wasn't allowing any of her hands to leave the pegasus's sides, and she barely even had her eyes open as well.

Never the less, the mounts seemed to fly just fine despite the riders not doing so well. Jacob was handling it a bit better, but not by much. Anyway, luckily for them, the small town soon came into view. As they began to descend, Karen found herself a bit low on breath.

"Are you okay?" asked Greg as he flew a bit closer.

"I'm okay....just a bit short....on breath." said Karen in deep breaths.

"None of us are used to the thin air here. Guess we'll have to depending on how long we stay." said Greg as the "ground" of the mountain began to get closer.
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: Flying through Eleion

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
They each sent their mounts in the direction of open land near the town as their mounts reacted and were ready to land. The mounts landed somewhat roughly as hard ground was under their feet again. Jacob practically rolled off his Wyvern and landed on his back staring up at the sky that didn't seem to end. Greg who had just finished landing ran over to Jacob. "Jacob? Hey, you alright there?" Greg asked with evident concern.

"......Not......Very...good......with......heights..." Jacob gasped out on his back between long breaths. Greg realized Jacob was almost actually just incredibly weak now. Greg reached his hand out and pulled Jacob up as Jacob instantly fell into Greg, drained of energy. Greg then pulled one if his arms behind his head and across his shoulders as Jacob just leaned against him, seeming unable to move on his own.

Shonku finished dismounting her Pegasus when she walked over, "Sorry about him. Heights and him just don't get along," Shonku said with somewhat of a laugh.

Jacob had shot Shonku a glance, but he was so drained she couldn't make out the expression he gave her. Greg chuckled a bit, " Makes sense. Alright then, let's head into town somewhere." Karen, who had paired with Micaiah agreed with him as they entered the town.

What happens next?
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: Landing in a small town

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
The whole group landed, eager to be on solid ground for at least a little while.

"All right, let's go look around." said Greg as the group dismounted. They allowed the flying mounts to hover around if they wanted, so they each flew off to fly around for a bit. After they did that, the group began walking. "Oh, you got a wing ornament in your hair Karen. Looks nice." smiled Greg.

Karen reached up to the back of her head, feeling a little pegasus knight ornament back there. "Thanks. I didn't even notice." she said.

With that, the group entered town. As they did, they noticed how ordinary it looked, except for the fact that it was pretty small and the lack of air. Anyway, they toured around. Jacob and Shonku noticed some items in a shop when the group briefly went separate ways. Shonku ended up seeing a couple things that they should buy, or at least she thought they should.

"A Spy Seal? What in the world could that be?" asked Jacob as they left. Shonku convinced him that they should get both. She had the other seal she saw, one that had a feather in it. It was supposedly called a Flying Seal.

"Hmm, doesn't seem to do much here. Maybe it works in other places perhaps. I'll save this for later." said Shonku as she pocketed the seal she had. The group soon reunited after the brief break-up, talking about anything they saw.

"Good thing those seals didn't cost much then." said Greg, although they had a good batch stored up from their dancing and waitress days plus the trip to RealmAnna.
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: The town

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
A little while later they found a small shop selling food, so they stopped to eat and also give some food to their mounts. "I talked with a few vendors," Jacob said, "This realm is known as Eleion." Jacob handed a piece of meat over to his Wyvern as it tore it apart quickly. Jacob couldn't help but chuckle at it's ruthlessness.

"Interesting." Greg said still eating, "A flying oriented realm...How do you guys feel about staying for a day, at least?"

Shonku nodded happily, "I wouldn't mind," she said as she petted her new mount and fed it, "I've taken a liking to this Pegasus."

"I wouldn't mind staying around for a little bit," Jacob agreed.

They decided to stay a little while longer as they finished eating and walked back through the town.

What happens next?
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: Moving on through

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
After letting the mounts fly off again, the group started walking through the town again, getting some rest before whatever hit them next.

"I think I'm finally getting used to the air." said Karen as she and Greg walked through the town. They had decided to go separate ways again, and Micaiah wanted to see something in the direction Jacob and Shonku went.

"Good. I think I am too. Almost hard to believe you can live this high." said Greg.

"Yeah. You could never imagine this back in our realm." said Karen.

"That's true. You can only imagine how real riders are able to stay in the sky for so long with no problems." said Greg.

"Yeah, I'd throw up before too long." laughed Karen, which got Greg laughing as well.

"I probably would too." smiled Greg.

"So what do you think those seals Jacob and Shonku got do?" asked Karen.

"Well, one had a feather, so perhaps it's related to a flying class, given the area. The other one, well I have no idea really." said Greg.

"I see. Guess we'll have to find out later. Anyway, tag you're it!" laughed Karen as she hit Greg and started running.

"Oh no you don't!" laughed Greg as he began following her through the town.
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: ....they rest up.

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content:
Jacob, Shonku, and Micaiah walked through a part of the town when they hit what they believed was almost a secluded area from the town, just a little ways out. They came across a large shallow pond with a few animals at some farther edges. "This is amazing," Shonku said awestruck, "I had no idea a place like this could be on a mountain!"

"Yeah and I had no idea mountains could float," Jacob added jokingly.

Micaiah went ahead to study a group of near by Pegasi, as Jacob and Shonku stopped by the lakeside. "This lake's just...amazing. It looks like one out of old stories I use to read."

"Oh?" Jacob said intrigued. "How so?"

"Well, there could usually be a castle or something, but the rest is almost perfect. A sunny day, a relaxing, beautiful view, and..." She trailed off.

Jacob looked over at her as she sat on the side of the lake. "And?" He said, waiting expectantly.

"A man and woman standing at it's edge." As soon as Shonku finished that sentence, she realized it sounded kinda cliche. Too storybook to be real. At least that's what she thought until Jacob grabbed both her hands with both of his and stood against her.

"I may not have read that book," Jacob began, "But I think I know what happens next." With that, he kissed her. And it did look cliche and storybook. But Shonku was fine with that. She pulled away as tears formed around her eyes and she broke into a smile. Jacob wiped them away and brought her down to lay down.

Some time passed when Micaiah returned and saw at the lakeside Shonku with her head on Jacob's upper chest as his arms wrapped around her. Micaiah smiled and shook Jacob awake. He awoke and thanked Micaiah, now realizing it was somewhat late. "We should meet back with Greg and Karen now." Micaiah said as Jacob nodded in agreement. And instead of waking Shonku, Jacob bent over and picked her up with both arms and walked back to the town where they found Greg and Karen.

"How was it," Karen asked curiously.

Jacob and Micaiah smiled, "Good. But I think we should rest here for tonight," Jacob said cradling the sleeping Shonku in his arms.

What happens next?
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: With the others

1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.content: Jacob was ready to head back to sleep when he felt...odd. For lack of a better word and had a small coughing fit. She covered her mouth and once it was over she looked down at her hand and saw blood. "Huh, Wha-?" Jacob then felt extremely light-headed and fell on her side. Jacob felt weak laying in the ground now. Jacob's entire body felt cold as she laid there shivering as she looked back towards camp she saw...
1311111211111111111111122211111121121112.title: ...Jacob begins feeling weird.

134.content: Greg was walking down a dust path when he saw something in a nearby field that looked out of color. He moved closer and saw it was...
134.title: Your choice

1341.content:
Name: Jacob
Weapon: Masamune, Scar Rifle.
Armor: Green Sneak.
Demon Compendium: Uriel, Gabriel, Raphael, Michael, Yamato Takeru, Demonee-ho, Shax, Lilith, Cherub, Koga Saburo, Maya.
Gender: Male
Alignment: Law
Origin: Eastern Kingdom of Mikado
-------------
He awoke with a sharp headache with his mask still over his mouth. Where was he? What happened? He then heard a man approaching.

What happens next?
1341.title: New Character (SMT)

13411.content:
Greg had almost no idea where he was. After leaving his home of Kiradia, he had kind of began to wonder around, hoping to fulfill his reason for traveling in the first place. He had hardly expected though to see a weirdo laying in the field he was walking through.

"Huh? Who's that?" he asked himself.

He walked closer to the person, beginning to see that the person was about his size. However, he really found the clothing to be pretty bizarre.

"Hey, are you okay?" asked Greg, shaking the man a bit. The man almost shot straight up, almost like a bullet.

"Woah, come down there!" said Greg. The man kept looking around, as if in a daze.

"Where is this place?" the man asked.

"Um, you don't know?" asked Greg. The man looked at Greg, looking at him from top to bottom.

"What's with the weird clothing?" he asked.

"I could ask you the same thing." Greg stared at the man.

The man looked around a bit before getting himself up slowly, getting used to his surroundings. Greg could tell that he didn't look used to the place. Then again, he wasn't either so he couldn't really talk.

"Pardon me for intruding, but what's your name?" asked Greg.
13411.title: Greg approaches

134111.content:
"I...My name's Jacob." He spoke as he looked Greg over. He looked like either a Samurai from the Kingdom or perhaps a Casualry.

"I'm Greg," he replied as he helped him up.

Jacob shook his head and looked back toward him. "Which direction are we in from the Kingdom?"

Greg returned a confused look. "Do...Do you mean Kiradia?"

"Kiradia? No, I mean Mikado."

Greg was all too confused now. "Mikado? Where's that?"

"Y-you mean...this isn't..." Jacob grabbed his head as his headache grew.

"You've obviously been through a lot. Here, take a rest, then we'll-" Greg began when something emerged from the bushes. The man had a rough face, long brown hair with leather clothing, blood across his body with three arrows in him and wielding two swords. He approached Greg with his sword drawn.

"A human...You're just a fool for helping this one, now go!" The man raised his hand to strike them when Greg blocked the blow with his blade. As he held the blade, the man freed his other hand and knocked Greg down. He stood above Greg when he was suddenly hit by something and disappeared with a painful howl. Jacob had his rifle out, the barrel smoking as he laid on his back, holding it with one hand. He fell onto his back more as Greg walked over and helped you up.

"You okay?" Jacob asked as he was lifted to his feet.

What happens next?
134111.title: Introductions

choices: Battle in the Outrealms, Anthony's POV
Battle in the Outrealms, Toni's POV
14.content:
Name: Anthony
Age: 22
Appearance: Roughly six feet tall, with dark brown hair and eyes, and fairly muscularly built. Average hair length.
Personality: A lone-wolf, but not a mean person and is very stubborn. Will always be there for his friends if he can; become his enemy and you will have a hard time. He is not a lone-wolf towards his friends. Very serious, but will every so often do something unexpected. Enjoys reading and playing games. Highly intelligent
Bio: A traveler from another world, he sacrificed himself to stop Grima in his own world, but instead of finding himself back home due to bonds, he found himself in the Outrealms. He now hops from world to world trying to return home. Married to Tharja.
Race: Human
Class: Dread Fighter (LV 28, but has reclassed several times)
Uses: Swords, Axes (Rank A for both), and Tomes (Half way through Rank B)
Asset and Weakness: Strength and Magic respectively
Equipment: Ragnell, Zixe (Forged Silver Axe with a might of 20, hit of 75, and a critical of 3), Megaflare (Forged Arcfire with a might of 13, a hit of 85, and a critical of 6), Mercurius, and an Elixir.
Skills: All Stats + 2, Limit Breaker, Armsthrift (Luck currently is 52 + 2), Sol (Skill currently is 50 + 2), and Resistance + 10

Name: Toni
Age: 22
Appearance: Slightly shorter than Anthony, has a bang coming down her left cheek, and one coming down the right side all the way to her shoulder, as well as a ponytail coming halfway down her back, and a small strand of hair curving upwards around her forehead and standing straight up. Built leaner than Anthony, but for her body size, it is roughtly the same ratio.
Personality: Almost the same as Anthony's, albeit slightly more feminine.
Bio: A female version of Anthony from a parallel world, thus the similarities. Like him, she sacrificed herself to stop Grima, and now searches for a way back home to her husband Chrom.
Race: Human
Class: Bride (LV 16 but reclassed several times)
Uses: Lances, Bows (Rank A for both), and Staves (Rank B)
Asset and Weakness: Magic and Luck respectively
Equipment: Sigurd's Lance (Forged to have a might of 17, a hit of 100, and a critical of 21), Physic, Zirfan (a forged Spear with 13 might, 80 hit, and 3 critical), Nidhogg, and an Elixer
Skills: All Stats + 2, Limit Breaker, Bond, Armsthrift (Luck is curently 32 + 2), and Ignis (Skill is currently 42+ 2).

Anthony and Toni are often winding up in the same world at the same time, but ending up on opposite sides of the wars between Einherjar each time. Neither can gain a true advantage in number of wins, and the loser will manage to escape the Outrealm to another before being captured. Both believe the other to be the cause of the fighting. Both have a large inventory of stuff in convoys they have with them, including several Second Seals.

So, where will we start?
14.title: Tactician #4

15.content: Just some Slots for all of you out there.
15.title: More Tacticians

choices: The groups morning after a rest in an old inn.
Camping out in the woods, they see a figure nearing. Friend or Foe?
They find some of the cards Old Hubba is missing!
151.content:
The Tacticians Profile:

Name: Lungulus
Age: 17
Appearance: A little below 6 feet tall and a slim build. He has short dark brown hair and almost completely white eyes.

Personality: Has a real problem with his anger when someones talks badly about his family, but always gives one warning about it whit a glare that could kill after the first bad thing is said. The second time it gets ugly. Only very few friends can talk about that matter freely with him. Apart from that he's a quiet und friendly person. Apart from his friend he barely shows his true emotions to anyone. Has an extrem and unreasonable kindness to children and cant be mad at them (or anyone else when their around), no matter what they do(Also goes for children of manakete even if they are a thousand years or more older than him). He is also unforgiving to those who actully inflict harm to them. Helps everyone aslong as they are willing to ask for his help.

Origin: A hardly known village in a distant Outrealm

Bio: Lungulus grew up in on of the very few villages where manakete and humans live together. HIs life was like one of the people in books that had a hard time but always ended happy. He had trouble with most other children since they where almost only manakete or a lot older. Since his father was out working almost all the time and his mother had a grave sickniss that would kill her in a few years, he took care of everything regarding the house and other problems which made him far to mature for his age. He always studied inhis free time or learn a little swordsmanship from a friend of his father. When the village was attacked by bandits he was one of the first to show up and help fight them of where his magic tallent was uncoverd. But as fate was never kind the bandits took a girl from the village as a hostage and gave thier demands in return for her. The villagers call for help from the royal army, but they would have taken two weeks to get there. For some reason or another Lungulus felt responsible to help her so he set out finding the bandits hideout. He was able to convince them to believe he wanted join thier group since no one remembered a child fighting them and was taken in. He almost instanly was chosen to take care of the prisioner and gladly did so. Whitin the two weeks bevor the armys arival he threated her as good as he could without the bandits noticing that he was looking for a way to get her out, while they were training him. After a few days of helping the girl he found out she was actully a about 800 years old manakete and her dragonstone was with the bandits stolen treasures. Lungulus got the stone back as the bandits leader allowed him to pick one of treasures for his great learning and keeping the girl quiet fo a while. As the royal army finally showed up at the hideout to get the manakete girl back, Lungulus set the girl free gave her the dragonstone back and they helped defeat the bandits. While the manakete girl was doing most though. In the end it went well and everyone got away alive, but Lungulus was still being lectured by the armies captian for his solo act to save the girl, but got a special skill-teaching book as a reward for his bravery and smart actions. After the whole incident was over and the army group returned to other matters, everything went back to the way it was for Lungulus. For the exception that the manakete girl was trying to befriend him. NO ONE had ever even went to talk with him if it wasen't necessary. But to him she was more like a big sister he could look up to and always rely on. After he opend up to her as time passed and the next years were a time where he was actully happy. A few days befor that all was torn from him, she gave him something no other manakete would do if they didn't trust someone from the heart. It was her dragonstone that she had since her birth, along with the promise to always keep it safe till he would give it back to her. The thing that confused Lungulus about this action the most was that she never told him her name even when they became friends. The next day Lungulus wanted to know what the meaning of this was and went to look for her as a brigth shine came out from the ground and he was suddenly pulled in a wierd blue stream like portal. After a mere few seconds he hit the ground hard and could barely stand up. He saw that he was on an island he didn't know and an old bald man looking at him. The old man was kind and introduce himself as Hubba who had accidently opened a Rift Door and through some magical mishap brought Lungulus to this island. Still completely confused and undeniable suspicious of old Hubba, Lungulus backed off but still keep a conservation going. Hubba wanted to use the Rift Door to summon the mystical cards of the Einherjar, which were the spirits of warrior and heroes of the past. He was suppose to keep them safe, but most of the cards fell in the wrong hands and are now scattered over many outrealms and if the Einherjar are summoned in the wrong way they could, in somekind, go on a berserk like killing spree. As he couldn't gather them all alone he asked Lungulus for help who, even tough was most likely about to go at Hubbas throat, agreed under the condition that Hubba would give him some traveling equipment. After Hubba gave Lungulus some fitting clothes, a little gold and knapsack with a vulnerary, Hubba told Lungulus to wait a minute or two and pulled out one of the few cards that were still in his possesion, giving it to Lungulus. This Einherjar should help him on the task as it was the card of a man named Leonardo, which after old Hubba summoned him for Lungulus has saved his life far to often and held him back when ever he snapped, being the one voice of reason in Lungulus head.

Race: Human
Class: Tactician (Level 12)
Uses: Swords (Level E) and Tomes (Level C)
Asset and Weakness: Magic and Defense
Equipment: Bronze Sword, Dragonstone, Vulnerary, Celica's Gale, Elthunder
Skills: Despiol, Limit break, Solidarity



Companions Profiles:

Name: Leonardo
Age: Looks to be just about 17 years old
Appearance: Approximately 5 foot 7, an average build. Has blond hair and dark blue eyes.

Personality: A thoughtful and serious young noble. He's from time to time the only thing that keeps Lungulus from committing a murder in bright daylight. Always willing to help the weak. Also has taken a liking at making unnecessery, sarcastic comments about Lungulus's sudden personality change when there are children around.

Origin: Daien on the continent of Tellius

Bio: Leonardo an archer was of noble birth, who became a member of the Dawn brigade to free the people of Daein from Begnions forceful rule. After Lungulus first heard of Einherjar and recieved Leonardo's card from old Hubba, who also summoned Leonardo. Though Lungulus had read that Einherjar were supposedly mere husk of the person they once were, Leonardo seems to be acting no different than you would normal people would. His body is flesh and blood. The only difference was that he had a barely noticeable bluish glow that only the card holders or other Einherjar could see. For Lungulus Leonardo was a real person and for Leonardo it was a new life with new goals to achieve. The two have been traveling together for about 2 years.

Race: Einherjar
Class: Archer (Level 16)
Uses: Bows (Level B)
Equipment: Steel Bow, Innes' Bow, Pure Water and a Concoction
Skills: Skill +2, Prescience, Discipline


Name: Anna
Age: Looks to be in her twenties
Appearance: Approximately 5 foot 11, athletic and curvy. Has brick red hair and red eyes.

Personality: Anna is a mysterious merchant with a greater lust to hoard gold than any dragon. She also has way too many secrets. She takes almost any opportunity too make profit. That she's clever enough too pull off most deals with a happy customer and a bag of gold in her hand. But underneath that greedy, clever and pretty cute exterior, Lungulus believes there is a saints justice since she never tricks commen villagers or steals from someone else than bandits and thiefs.

Origin: Unknown

Bio: She is one of the many, many Anna's running around the various Outrealms. Nobody knows why there are so many Anna's and not even Anna herself knows how many there are, but at least she knows she's one of the younger ones. How she knows that? "A Secret". Lungulus and Leonardo met Anna when they were chasing a thief that stole some of hers and other merchants goods. As her thanks she gaven a golden card but without tellnig them the use of it. Of course she tried to get them to buy some of her goods with special "discounts". After another ruin with the two at a thieves den and Anna seeing the dragonstone Lungulus was carrying around, she immediately was hoping to get it off him to make a little fortune of it, since they were extremly rare in this Outrealm. In the end there was no real deal, but some remaining bandits coming out off their hiding place knocking Lungulus out almost instandly and injuring Leonardo badly. Anna of course took the chance to make profit and convinced Leonardo to give her the stone for some items to fix them back up. Even though Anna went ahead right to one of her sister shops, with a head start of a whole day on Lunglus and Leonardo, to tell her she got the dragonstone she was asked for the moment she had put down the stone in front of her sisters hand a sword was rammed into the counter before she could grab it. Barely missing her hand at that. Lungulus took his dragonstone back before any of the Anna could say a word and replaced in with three small and a medium bullion. The Anna who kind of stole the stone chased after him out of the shop. With bullions stored away of course. She took a liking to his determination and joined them to make some profit. To Leonardo's surprise Lungulus accepted her choice.

Race: Human (supposedly)
Class: Thief (Level 18)
Uses: Swords (Level C)
Equipment: Steel Sword, Levin sword and an Elixir
Skills: Locktouch, Movement +1
151.title: Tactician #5

1513.content:
"Hey! Look what I happened to find!" Anna squealed happily. She ran over to Lungulus and Leonardo who finished setting up camp outside a small town. Anna just returned after showing some of her goods to the nearby townsfolk. She laid on the table a few Einherjar cards.

Lungulus walked towards them surprised, "Wait, are these Old Hubba's?" He asked as he looked at a few of them.

"Yep," Anna said in her happy, upbeat voice. "Some guy in town sold them to me. Had no idea what they were. Bought them for just 1,000 gold," Anna exclaimed with glee.

Leonardo had grabbed one of the cards and looked it over. "Hm. Odd." Lungulus and Anna both turned and looked at him.

"What is it Leo?" Anna said questionily.

Leonardo flipped the card to face them. On the card was...
1513.title: They find some of the cards Old Hubba is missing!

15131.content:
Name: Jacob
Species: Human (Somewhat Einherjar)
Class: Dread Fighter, Level 15.
Appearance: Short Black/Brown hair. Medium build. Blue Dread Fighter garbs similar to Priam's without a mask on right arm and red electricity.
Weapons: Killing Edge, Mjolnir, Silver Sword, Alm's Blade.
Weapons stat: Swords = B, Tomes = A, Axes = D
Gender: Male
Origin: A small Outrealm village.
Age: 16 (almost 17)
Skills: Pass, Acrobat, Limit Breaker, Armsthrift, Lethality.
Personality: He can be curious at some moments and others be quite ruthless. He tries to adapt to situations as best as he can. He scolds himself at times for being too trustworthy. Tries to make friends when he can, but knows when someone's his enemy.
Bio: Jacob once traveled through Outrealms exploring when he was set upon by a few odd Einherjar. They fought but ended up overwhelming him. They then dragged Jacob through the Outrealms until they reached a temple ruin. Jacob was laid on an altar of sorts as the Einherjar suddenly sealed Jacob into an Einherjar Card. They then threw it back through the Outrealms, hoping it would be lost forever. Jacob had no memory of a past family, not knowing if they were alive or dead. From being left in the card, Jacob would have the same glow Einherjar usually have. Jacob has been trapped inside since...

------------------

The card held a picture of a young-looking Dread Fighter holding a Killing Edge with one hand, pointing it horizontally over his shoulder, while reading a tome in the other. Lungulus and Anna both knew quite a bit of the Einherjar, but this one was new. "He doesn't seem like a normal Einherjar does he?" Leonardo inquired.

"You're right," Lungulus said, "It does seem odd..."

"Well what are we gonna do with it?" Anna said, curious if she made the right choice buying it.

What happens next?
15131.title: ...another character.

151311.content:
"Here," Leonardo said handing the card to Lungulus, "You should decide what we do."

Lungulus looked at the card again with the mysterious figure on it. His curiosity was getting the best of him as he summoned the card's figure, who's name he saw was "Jacob".

--------

Jacob opened his eyes, which immediately closed again from the sunlight. Jacob was on his back on the ground, his body felt weak from being left in the card, not originally being an Einherjar. Jacob then realized there were people around him. Turning his head, he saw a man in Tactician robes, a woman with red colorful hair, and a man with yellow hair and archer uniform, who seemed familiar to him. He looked back at the man in tactician robes standing over him and reached a hand out, and said in a raspy voice "H-help me...pl-please..."

What happens next?
151311.title: They summon Jacob
